INTERACTION DESIGN | CONCEPT

Dynamic Class Enrollment Platform

Reimagining the experience of enrolling into university courses through a single-page web application.

    Project Facts

  • Client: HEC Montr√©al
  • Project Type:

  • My Role:

(Under construction / June 2021)


Context

As an exercise in the UX Design course within the MSc. in User Experience in a Business Context. Following a systemic/structured process of empathizing, ideation, user testing and iterative prototyping.

### Challenge Reinvent the online experience for enrolling into university courses by setting up a course selection system that can be used by all schools in Quebec to standardize practices in the community and give students a better experience. Using the current platform as a staring point. Concept Testing Refining the idea: Card sorting
